pages.text: Bai ouxiang zhe shuo:“Jiaru an la yiyu, women he women de zuxian ji bu hui she ta er chongbai renhe dongxi, women ye bu hui wei jing ta de mingling er shanzi jin zhi renhe dongxi.” Tamen de qian ren ye ceng zheyang zuoguo. Shizhemen de zeren zhishi mingbai di chuanda [qishi].

Mei ge minzu zhong, wo du paiqianle yi wei shizhe [bing xuangao]:“Nimen dang chongbai an la, dang yuan bi emo.” Tamen zhong youxie shi huo an la yindao de, youxie shi gai mi wu de. Nimen dang zai da dishang luxing, guancha fouren zhenli zhe de jieju ruhe!
Jishi ni [mu sheng] kewang tamen neng huode yindao, an la ye jue bu hui yindao shi ren mi wu zhe. Tamen jue meiyou renhe yuanzhu zhe.
Tamen yi an la fachu tamen zui zhuangyan de shiyan:“An la jue bu hui shi sizhe fuhuo.” Bu![Ta bi jiang shi sizhe fuhuo], zhe shi [ta xu xia de] zhenshi de nuoyan, dan da duoshu ren bing bu zhidao.
Yibian ta wei tamen chanming tamen suo fenqi de, yibian bu xinyang zhe zhidao ziji yuan shi shuohuang zhe.
Dang wo xiang chuangzao yi jian shiwu shi, wo zhi xu xialing shuo:“You!” Yushi jiu youle.
Zai shou pohai zhihou wei an la zhidao qianju zhe, wo bi zai jinshi ciyu tamen youmei de jiayuan, dan houshi de baochou cai shi zuida de, jiaru tamen zhidao.
Tamen shi jianren de, tamen xinlai tamen de zhu [an la].
